result.title: Div.2 ranking in contest announcements is meaningless
result.content:
As we all know,

contest announcements usually include a top-5 ranking after the contests are over.

But let's face it, 90% of the time the top scorers are either smurf or newly created accounts.

I understand it is virtually impossible to circumvent such actions, but I think we can at least exclude the newly created accounts.

Otherwise, I would rather see no rankings for Div.2 at all, since none of them are actually "Newcomers" who improved themselves to get decent results.
